org.pircbotx.hooks
Class CoreHooks

java.lang.Object
  org.pircbotx.hooks.CoreHooks
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener
public class CoreHooks
extends Object
implements Listener

Core Hooks of PircBotX that preform basic and expected operations. Any listener that wishes to duplicate functionality should replace CoreHooks in the ListenerManager with a subclass of this class (this way you don't have to duplicate all the functionality).

Warning: Removing CoreHooks without providing a replacement will produce undesired results like server timeouts due to not responding to pings.

Author:
Leon Blakey
